recipe.name: BROWNIE WITH ORANGE PEEL AND NUT PRALINE
recipe.description: HOW TO PREPARE BROWNIE WITH ORANGE PEEL AND NUT PRALINE

ingredients.text: Спеції по 0.5 ч.л.: сухий часник .солодка паприка, чорний молотий перець, карі, лавровий лист 2шт сіль за смаком

cookingSteps.text: Preheat the oven to 180 degrees. In a small bowl in a water bath, melt 150g of chocolate and 80 g of butter. Stir until smooth. Put it aside to cool.
Sift 50 g of flour and mix with baking powder (5 g) and cocoa powder (10 g). Mix with melted chocolate until smooth.
